metadata.title: CVE-2021-47176 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:s390/dasd: add missing discipline functionFix crash with illegal operation exception in dasd_device_tasklet.Commit b72949328869 ("s390/dasd: Prepare for additional path eventhandling")renamed the verify_path function for ECKD but not for FBA and DIAG.This leads to a panic when the path verification function is called for aFBA or DIAG device.Fix by defining a wrapper function for dasd_generic_verify_path().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
